programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Asia
programme.desc: Live from Hong Kong, Bloomberg Markets: Asia brings you the most important global business and breaking markets news information as it happens.

programme.title: Dead Bite
programme.desc: A comedy-horror venture about an aspiring hiphop group who head to Mermaid Island to shoot a music video, expecting bikini-clad girls and sunshine but end up battling ghouls and demons.

programme.title: The Slit Mouthed Woman
programme.desc: Decades ago, a suburb was terrorized by the spirit of a woman in a surgical mask who asked victims, "Am I pretty?" before slaughtering them. Now, police and teachers must end a new wave of carnage.

programme.title: Efsunlu Kabirden Gelen
programme.desc: A student thinks that she is doing a good deed when she tries to help Burcu, a sick girl who is locked up in a special room. But is she really helping, or merely a pawn in a game of death?

programme.title: Arumi
programme.desc: 15 years after the murder of her mother and sister, Rasty invites four friends to her parents villa. Intending only to vacation at the villa, they end up with far more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Black Hollow Cage
programme.desc: A girl finds among the trees a mysterious cubic device with the ability to change the past.

programme.title: Alemi Cin (Zone of the Djinn)
programme.desc: A young woman starts having nightmares about her family. With the help of a friend, she must face the world of jins.

programme.title: Alem-I Cin 2 Aka Hell's Door
programme.desc: A police officer is torn between putting away a suspect in a mysterious disappearance, and seeking the suspect's help to save his own son from torment.

programme.title: The Slit Mouthed Woman 2
programme.desc: Based on an urban legend, a high school student is disfigured when a deranged jilted lover splashes acid on her. She sinks deeper and deeper into depression and eventually becomes a mass murderer.

programme.title: The Werewolf Game -The Villagers's Side
programme.desc: 10 high school students are kidnapped and forced to participate to play a deadly game.

programme.title: The Werewolf Game - The Beast Side
programme.desc: A high school girl has to kill 9 others of high school students in order to survive from the game.

programme.desc: Seram Selebriti adalah rancangan yang akan menceritakan pengalaman artis-artis Malaysia tentang alam mistik.

programme.desc: Seram Selebriti adalah rancangan yang akan menceritakan pengalaman artis-artis Malaysia tentang alam mistik.

programme.title: Warning : Do Not Play
programme.desc: Aspiring director Mi-Jung finds strange things happening to her after she begins researching a movie that's supposedly filmed by a ghost.

programme.title: Dark Secrets
programme.desc: A young couple move into a house, hoping to start a new life after losing their child to a miscarriage. But they get no peace at all.

programme.title: Are You Scared
programme.desc: Kidnapped teenagers find themselves the stars of a reality horror show, where a shadowy figure traps them one by one to play the twisted and terrifying games of death, as he exacts his revenge on them.

programme.desc: For homicide detectives, the first 48 hours is everything. Once that line is breached without a lead, the odds of solving a case are cut in half. It's a race against the clock to solve breaking cases.

programme.desc: A terrible car crash leaves a father dead and his son horribly injured. The driver of the other car is miraculously unharmed. Tragic accident or deadly driver?

programme.desc: A shocking love triangle could destroy a family when past entanglements are discovered, and a woman crosses dangerous lines in her pursuit of motherhood.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Three cases are highlighted from the First 48 archive that feature stories of friendship gone wrong.

programme.title: Hoarders S11 Ep06
programme.desc: Sherry's justification for her massive hoard is that it protects her from the outside world, resulting in a six-foot-high wall of trash blocking entry into the home.

programme.title: My Crazy Ex S4 Ep33
programme.desc: A man claims he was abducted by aliens. His girlfriend hopes to just move past the encounter. But when he prepares for an alien invasion, she's unsure they can be together.

programme.desc: A young woman is brutally attacked on a train by an assailant intent on killing her, and a coach sees a student with a gun roaming the halls and helps avert a potential school shooting.

programme.desc: An auto parts store owner turns the tables on an armed assailant by taking his gun, an armoured car driver survives a terrifying attack, and a hotel clerk flips the script on an armed robber.

programme.desc: More survivors untangle the complex and insidious sex trafficking scheme that ensnared them as trusting young women pursuing their dreams, including never before told stories.
